Articles.Content:
Useful as a personal transport vehicle, Dragonfly is an easy to fly, but very manoeuvreable aircraft. Can be flown with SAS for very stable flying, or SAS can be turned off for a plane that is still easy to fly but with slightly quicker responses.

For best performance, the roll keys (Q and E) should be used in preference to the yaw keys (A and D) for turning, just like the real thing.

Downside: Due to the high wing area, this plane can be difficult to land, as it just wants to stay airborne. Anything more than being gently eased on to the runway will result in a bounce that puts the craft back in the air, so whilst being easy to fly, it will test your landing abilities.

Still from animated gif, showing that the tower flyby is actually being performed in the inverted position. That's how easy this plane is to fly.
